messages.title: John Leech the best MP we've ever had
messages.content: Standing up for us in Parliament.

messages.title: Standing up for south Manchester
messages.content: Local champion, local choice John Leech, has been a great success for south Manchester.

messages.title: Labour's record of shame
messages.content: Broke their 1987 manifesto promise, Hiding the truth about their Illegal war, Let our transport failing, Â£82 million police funding error, Highest truancy rate in the country under Labour.

messages.title: It's John Leech or Labour here
messages.content: Only local champion, John Leech can beat Labour's career politician here in South Manchester.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's between John Leech or Labour in south Manchester. No Conservative has been elected in Manchester for 18 years. Can't win here! Conservative can't win here.

leaflet.personalStatement: Fought to save Christie Hospital, Supported a minimum wage increase, Fighting for our children's future, Supporting newly created businesses.

images.caption: John Leech the best MP we've ever had
It's John Leech or Labour here

leaflet.additionalNotes: No Conservative has been elected in Manchester for 18 years.
